title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing 'Ok' after setting the output location and the classpath, the following error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and the classpath are considered as two separate operations. Setting the output location first leads to an illegal state.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the settings or preferences section.
3. Locate the option to set the output location.
4. Set the output location to a specific folder.
5. Find the option to set the classpath.
6. Specify the desired classpath.
7. Press 'Ok' to save the changes.
8. Notice the error message 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'.
